name: 1-bit Ninja Remix Rush
description:
1-bit Ninja is back in an endless procedurally generated race against the clock. Bounce on enemies, jump chasms and collect bits to fight back the ever ticking timer.

Featuring a unique blend of 3D and retro handheld inspired visuals along with the 2 button controls and precise platforming of the original, 1-bit Ninja Remix Rush brings you an ever changing challenge on the go.
